response.original_title: Charlie Chan and the Curse of the Dragon Queen
response.overview: Famous detective Charlie Chan is called out of retirement to help a San Francisco detective solve a mysterious series of murders. With his bumbling grandson as his sidekick, Chan also encounters an old nemesis known as the Dragon Queen who is the prime suspect.
response.tagline: Murderer who turn victim into human baked potato have real appetite for crime.
response.title: Charlie Chan and the Curse of the Dragon Queen
